segments.text: Could you do something to advance your shipment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's hard to say . But why ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We expect the goods to be on the market before the end of December to catch up with the Spring Festival sales .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can understand your position . We can not make any promise , but we'll try our best .
segments.speaker: S2
